unnormalised: Arrey yaar, RCB lost again! Looks like their score was just 145/8 in 20 overs. At least Virat Kohli scored 50 runs, or half a century as they say. Wonder if they'll ever break the jinx. Maybe next year, they'll need 200+ to have a chance. *sigh* Always the bridesmaid, never the bride, eh?
normalised: Arrey yaar, R-C-B lost again! Looks like their score was just one hundred and forty five divided by eight in twenty overs. At least Virat Kohli scored fifty runs, or half a century as they say. Wonder if they'll ever break the jinx. Maybe next year, they'll need two hundred plus to have a chance. asterisk sigh asterisk Always the bridesmaid, never the bride, eh?
